name: BatteryTimeSeriesData
description: A description of battery time series data

properties.name: battery_id
properties.description: UUID of the battery that the data describes

properties.name: date_time_stamp
properties.description: Date and time stamp of the measurement.

properties.name: test_time
properties.description: Time of the measurement relative to the start of the experiment.

properties.name: battery_current
properties.description: Measured instantaneous electric current through the battery.

properties.name: battery_voltage
properties.description: Measured instantaneous voltage of the battery.

properties.name: battery_temperature
properties.description: Measured instantaneous temperature of the battery.

properties.name: battery_temperature_location
properties.description: Location of the battery temperature measurement. Valid entries: housing, tab, internal, unknown.

properties.name: environment_temperature
properties.description: Measured instantaneous temperature of the environment.

properties.name: environment_temperature_source
properties.description: Source of the environment temperature data. Valid entries: set, measured, unknown.
